qas.question: What is an honorary synonym for Bodhisattvayana?
The Astasahasrika Prajnaparamita Sutra is an important text of what type?

context: According to Jan Nattier, the term Mahāyāna "Great Vehicle" was originally even an honorary synonym for Bodhisattvayāna "Bodhisattva Vehicle." The Aṣṭasāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā Sūtra, an early and important <a0_0><a1_0><a2_0>Mahayana<a2_0/><a1_0/><a0_0/> text, contains a simple and brief definition for the term bodhisattva: "Because he has enlightenment as his aim, a bodhisattva-mahāsattva is so called."
